document_data.name: ''Wand of Flame Extinguishing''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''wand of flame extinguishing''''' was a [[magic item]] used to put out magical and nonmagical fires.
document_data.Powers: This item could extinguish smaller nonmagical fires without using a charge. One charge was expended to extinguish a larger normal fire or a smaller magical fire, and two charges were needed for larger magical fires. Additionally, these wands could be used to cause a great deal of harm to fire-based creatures such as [[fire elemental]]s.
document_data.Notable Owners:
* [[Kadorr]], a [[Zhentarim]] [[wizard]], carried a ''wand of flame extinguishing''.
* [[Volodar Celdomen]], a businessman in [[Ravens Bluff]], kept a ''wand of flame extinguishing'' in a secret compartment of his bedroom chest.{{Cite polyhedron/41/The Living City: Volodar's Stardust Inn|24}}
